50 const size_t RhrMessageSize = 840;
51 
53 enum {

63 struct V_RHREXPORT rfbMsg
64 {
65  rfbMsg(uint8_t type)
66  : type(type)
67  {}
68 
69  uint8_t type;
70 };
71 
72 enum {
73  rfbEyeMiddle,
74  rfbEyeLeft,
75  rfbEyeRight
76 };
77 
79 struct V_RHREXPORT matricesMsg: public rfbMsg {
80  matricesMsg()
81  : rfbMsg(rfbMatrices)
82  , last(0)
83  , eye(rfbEyeMiddle)
84  , viewNum(-1)
85  , width(0)
86  , height(0)
87  , requestNumber(0)
88  , time(0.)
89  {
90  memset(model, '\0', sizeof(model));
91  memset(view, '\0', sizeof(view));
92  memset(proj, '\0', sizeof(proj));
93  memset(head, '\0', sizeof(head));
94  }
95 
96  uint8_t last;
97  uint8_t eye;
98  int16_t viewNum;
99  uint16_t width, height;
100  uint32_t requestNumber;
101  double time;
102  double model[16];
103  double view[16];
104  double proj[16];
105  double head[16];
106 
107  bool operator==(const matricesMsg &other) const {
108 
109  if (eye != other.eye)
110  return false;
111  if (viewNum != other.viewNum)
112  return false;
113  if (width != other.width)
114  return false;
115  if (height != other.height)
116  return false;
117 
118  for (int i=0; i<16; ++i) {
119  if (model[i] != other.model[i])
120  return false;
121  if (view[i] != other.view[i])
122  return false;
123  if (proj[i] != other.proj[i])
124  return false;
125  if (head[i] != other.head[i])
126  return false;
127  }
128 
129  return true;
130  }
131 };
132 static_assert(sizeof(matricesMsg) < RhrMessageSize, "RHR message too large");
133 
135 struct V_RHREXPORT lightsMsg: public rfbMsg {
136  lightsMsg()
137  : rfbMsg(rfbLights)
138  , viewNum(-1)
139  {
140  memset(pad, '\0', sizeof(pad));
141 
142  lights[0].diffuse[0] = lights[0].diffuse[1] = lights[0].diffuse[2] = lights[0].diffuse[3] = 1;
143  lights[0].specular[0] = lights[0].specular[1] = lights[0].specular[2] = lights[0].specular[3] = 1;
144  }
145 
147  static const int NumLights = 4;
148 
150  struct Light {
151  // as in OpenGL
152  uint8_t enabled;
153 
154  uint8_t pad[7];
155 
156  double position[4];
157 
158  double ambient[4];
159  double diffuse[4];
160  double specular[4];
161 
162  double spot_direction[3];
163  double spot_cutoff;
164  double spot_exponent;
165 
166  double attenuation[3];
167 
168  Light()
169  {
170  memset(this, '\0', sizeof(*this));
171 
172  position[2] = 1;
173 
174  ambient[3] = 1;
175 
176  spot_direction[2] = -1;
177  spot_cutoff = 180;
178 
179  attenuation[0] = 1;
180  }
181 
182  bool operator!=(const Light &o) const {
183 
184  if (enabled != o.enabled)
185  return true;
186 
187  for (int i=0; i<4; ++i) {
188  if (position[i] != o.position[i])
189  return true;
190  if (ambient[i] != o.ambient[i])
191  return true;
192  if (diffuse[i] != o.diffuse[i])
193  return true;
194  if (specular[i] != o.specular[i])
195  return true;
196  }
197 
198  for (int i=0; i<3; ++i) {
199  if (spot_direction[i] != o.spot_direction[i])
200  return true;
201  if (attenuation[i] != o.attenuation[i])
202  return true;
203  }
204 
205  if (spot_cutoff != o.spot_cutoff)
206  return true;
207  if (spot_exponent != o.spot_exponent)
208  return true;
209 
210  return false;
211  }
212  };
213 
214  int16_t viewNum;
215  uint8_t pad[5];
216 
218  Light lights[NumLights];
219 
220  bool operator!=(const lightsMsg &o) const {
221  if (viewNum != o.viewNum)
222  return true;
223  for (int i=0; i<NumLights; ++i) {
224  if (lights[i] != o.lights[i])
225  return true;
226  }
227  return false;
228  }
229 };
230 static_assert(sizeof(lightsMsg) < RhrMessageSize, "RHR message too large");
231 
233 struct V_RHREXPORT boundsMsg: public rfbMsg {
234  boundsMsg()
235  : rfbMsg(rfbBounds)
236  , sendreply(0)
237  , radius(-1.)
238  {
239  memset(pad, '\0', sizeof(pad));
240  memset(center, '\0', sizeof(center));
241  }
242 
243  uint8_t sendreply;
244  uint8_t pad[6];
245  double center[3];
246  double radius;
247 };
248 static_assert(sizeof(boundsMsg) < RhrMessageSize, "RHR message too large");
249 
250 enum rfbTileFlags {
251  rfbTileNone = 0,
252  rfbTileFirst = 1,
253  rfbTileLast = 2,
254  rfbTileRequest = 4,
255 };
256

260  rfbDepth24Bit,

262  rfbDepthFloat,
263  rfbColorRGBA
264 };
265 
266 enum rfbTileCompressions {
267  rfbTileRaw = 0,
268  rfbTileSnappy = 1,
269  rfbTileDepthQuantize = 2,
270  rfbTileJpeg = 4,
271  rfbTileDepthZfp = 8,
272  rfbTileClear = 16,
273 };

276 struct V_RHREXPORT tileMsg: public rfbMsg {
277  tileMsg()
278  : rfbMsg(rfbTile)
279  , flags(rfbTileNone)
280  , format(rfbColorRGBA)
281  , compression(rfbTileRaw)
282  , eye(rfbEyeMiddle)
283  , frameNumber(0)
284  , requestNumber(0)
285  , size(0)
286  , x(0)
287  , y(0)
288  , viewNum(-1)
289  , width(0)
290  , height(0)
291  , totalwidth(0)
292  , totalheight(0)
293  , timestep(-1)
294  , unzippedsize(0)
295  , requestTime(0.)
296  {
297  memset(model, '\0', sizeof(model));
298  memset(view, '\0', sizeof(view));
299  memset(proj, '\0', sizeof(proj));
300  memset(proj, '\0', sizeof(head));
301  }
302 
303  uint8_t flags;
304  uint8_t format;
305  uint8_t compression;
306  uint8_t eye;
307  uint32_t frameNumber;
308  uint32_t requestNumber;
309  uint32_t size;
310  uint16_t x;
311  uint16_t y;
312  int16_t viewNum;
313  uint16_t width;
314  uint16_t height;
315  uint16_t totalwidth;
316  uint16_t totalheight;
317  int32_t timestep;
318  int32_t unzippedsize;
319  double head[16];
320  double view[16];
321  double proj[16];
322  double model[16];
323  double requestTime;
324 };
325 static_assert(sizeof(tileMsg) < RhrMessageSize, "RHR message too large");
326 
328 struct V_RHREXPORT animationMsg: public rfbMsg {
329  animationMsg()
330  : rfbMsg(rfbAnimation)
331  , total(0)
332  , current(-1)
333  {}
334 
335  int32_t total;
336  int32_t current;
337  double time;
338 };
339 static_assert(sizeof(animationMsg) < RhrMessageSize, "RHR message too large");
340 
341 struct V_RHREXPORT variantMsg: public rfbMsg {
342  variantMsg()
343  : rfbMsg(rfbVariant)
344  , configureVisibility(0)
345  , visible(0)
346  , remove(0)
347  {
348  memset(name, '\0', sizeof(name));
349  }
350 
351  uint32_t configureVisibility;
352  uint32_t visible;
353  uint32_t remove;
354  char name[200];
355 };
356 static_assert(sizeof(variantMsg) < RhrMessageSize, "RHR message too large");

359 typedef rfbMsg RhrSubMessage;

363 class V_RHREXPORT RemoteRenderMessage: public MessageBase<RemoteRenderMessage, REMOTERENDERING> {
364 public:
365  RemoteRenderMessage(const RhrSubMessage &rhr, size_t payloadSize=0);
366  const RhrSubMessage &rhr() const;
367  RhrSubMessage &rhr();
368 private:
369  std::array<char, RhrMessageSize> m_rhr;
370 };
371 static_assert(sizeof(RemoteRenderMessage) <= Message::MESSAGE_SIZE, "message too large");
